Sections.Text: Awesome! Let's get the basics out of the way quick…
What's your first name?
Search Engine Optimisation or SEO is the organisation of the website content in a particular manner which increases the traffic organically from popular search engines such as Google, etc.
(Inorganic traffic is advertising - something you pay for.)
SEO is a constant activity and it has been automated for the NowFloats website.
So you just have to just update your business content, our tech takes care of increasing the traffic.
Cool, eh?
Alright then, let’s fill out your business address.
Just to confirm, here are the details:

STREET_ADDRESS [~STREET_ADDRESS]
CITY [~CITY]
PERSON_NAME [~PERSON_NAME]
COUNTRY [~COUNTRY]
EMAIL [~EMAIL]
LAT [~LAT]
LNG [~LNG]
BUSINESS_NAME [~BUSINESS_NAME]
PINCODE [~PINCODE]
BUSINESS_CATEGORY [~BUSINESS_CATEGORY]
PHONE [~PHONE]
SUGGESTED_TAG [~SUGGESTED_TAG]
TAG [~TAG]
SUGGESTED_WEBSITE_URL [~SUGGESTED_WEBSITE_URL]
What category of business does [~BUSINESS_NAME] belong to?
Sorry, we could not create your website, because [~ERROR_MESSAGE]
Please enter the website address you want…
[~BUSINESS_CATEGORY]
[~EMAIL]
[~BUSINESS_NAME]
Thanks, we now have all the information needed to create your website. Just go over the information one last time.

Name: Print All Variables to be sent to Create FP

Sections.Text:
CITY [~CITY]
EMAIL [~EMAIL]
BUSINESS_NAME [~BUSINESS_NAME]
PHONE [~PHONE]
TAG [~TAG]
Hello [~PERSON_NAME]
What is your business called?

[~TAG]
.nowfloats.com
You must have received a little SMS from us. Fill in the 4-digit code below.

Name: FP Tag not available

Sections.Text:
[~TAG]
.nowfloats.com

CardHeader: ⚠️ Sorry, the requested website address is not available.

Sections.Text: Great!
Lastly, I need your email ID to send you your username, password and other important details.
To verify your account, I need your personal mobile number.
I will send you an OTP on this number, so please make sure your phone number is valid.

Name: Phone Number Already Exists

Sections.Text: [~COUNTRYCODE] [~PHONE]

CardHeader: ⚠ Uh oh, this phone number already exists in our database.

Name: API Call: Check FP Tag Availability
API Call - Get Suggested Website Names
API Call : Get OTP On Call

Sections.Text: Sorry, I could not create your website at the moment. You will receive a call from our team soon.

Name: Tell Why Location Permission is Required

Sections.Text: Your exact location helps in optimizing local SEO for the site. Location access is critical to locate your business on the map
[~COUNTRYCODE] [~PHONE]
Aaaand it's done! Your business website is up and running.
Here's what your website looks like
It may seem a bit bare right now, but I can help you make it much better.
So do you have a little time?

Name: Enter OTP-without resend
CardHeader: Please enter the OTP sent on [~COUNTRYCODE] [~PHONE]

Sections.Text: Alright, next is your business address.
Be precise, for both your customers and SEO.
Alright then, you can login to the app and update whenever you like.
You can also track your visitors (only after you have updated the site a few times ; )
Remember – regular and relevant updates about your business.
Have a lovely day. Bye.
[~STREET_ADDRESS], [~CITY], [~COUNTRY], [~PINCODE]
[~BUSINESS_CATEGORY]

Name: Enter OTP Card
CardHeader: Please enter the OTP sent on [~COUNTRYCODE] [~PHONE]

Sections.Text:
[~TAG]
.nowfloats.com
[~EMAIL]
[~BUSINESS_NAME]

Enter OTP Card

CardHeader: 👍 Hallelujah! This website address is available.

Sections.Text: Hi! My name is Ria, and I will help you set up your website within minutes.
It's really simple, so let's get started?
I'll use your device location to pin-point the exact address of [~BUSINESS_NAME]
Click continue to give me access
Congratulations!
You've got an exclusive evaluation access for 30 days
Enjoy unlimited updates, automatic search engine optimization, custom pages and business enquiries from the site.
After 30 days, you can purchase an yearly plan and get access to premium features like
Dedicated account manager, lead tracking, weekly reports and regular product trainings.
